title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected at the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select any other item in the library outline view.
OB: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: Expected behavior: Upon selecting an item in the library outline view, the selected item should receive focus and remain selected.
SR:
Follow these steps to reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select any other item in the library outline view.
